fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Attack someone with a weapon of choice, this weapon can be quite litterally whatever you choose. The kill credit will involve the said weapon

fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
* You cannot be "shot"
* **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**
* As long as this role has not rolled in a game, all invalid roles become valid and all valid roles become invalid for the Daily Streak faction
